flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour = <<60=60>>60 minutes.
We convert the time to hours, so 42 minutes = 42/60 hours = 7/9 hours.
So in 42 minutes, the distance the bus traveled in miles is 50 * (7/9) = <<50*(7/9)=350/9>>350/9 miles.
#### 350/9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42/60, not 7/9. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
